archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.1.8c: c) ensuring strategic objectives remain valid and in line with the changing needs of the business (e.g. mergers and acquisitions, major new IT projects or changes to regulation/legislation that place unforeseen demands on the organisation).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
